headline: $168 Million USD in Construction Value of Projects - PowerBank Shares Additional Information on the Safe Harbor of 15 Distributed Solar and Energy Storage Projects in New York State
summary: PowerBank Corporation (NASDAQ: SUUN) (Cboe CA: SUNN) (FSE: 103) ("PowerBank" or the "Company"), a leader in North American energy infrastructure development and asset ownership, is pleased to share additional updates following the recent announcement of the safe harbor of 15 late-stage distributed solar and energy storage projects (the "Projects") across New York state. The Projects are expected to bring approximately 67 MW DC of solar and 11 MWh of energy storage to the State. See associated pr

content.title: $168 Million USD in Construction Value of Projects - PowerBank Shares Additional Information on the Safe Harbor of 15 Distributed Solar and Energy Storage Projects in New York State
content.summary: PowerBank Corporation (NASDAQ: SUUN) (Cboe CA: SUNN) (FSE: 103) ("PowerBank" or the "Company"), a leader in North American energy infrastructure development and asset ownership, is pleased to share additional updates following the recent announcement of the safe harbor of 15 late-stage distributed solar and energy storage projects (the "Projects") across New York state. The Projects are expected to bring approximately 67 MW DC of solar and 11 MWh of energy storage to the State. See associated pr
